forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: particle effects

comments.text: you can add particles to your creations by picking the paint brush, then switching to the fourth tab to the right.
for instance, this cookie emits particles.
when applying a particle, you can hold your other hand's trigger and move the hand up + down to adjust the slider.
as other color & material layers, particles can be animated over time (or based on events like touch) through different states.

thread.latestCommentText: as other color & material layers, particles can be animated over time (or based on events like touch) through different states.
